quest.name: Life after Doma
objectives: Survey Namai from a safe distance.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: It seems peaceful enough to me...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Even if there aren't any soldiers in the village, it would be foolish to simply stride in and announce ourselves.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Let no man claim that I am reckless. Prudence has ever been my watchword! Forename─venture closer, if you would, and confirm that there are no soldiers lurking about.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Forgive me, my friend, but unlike Yugiri, I am not made for the shadows.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Who is this boy, and where is he taking us?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Judging from the reactions of the villagers, it's probably for the best that we left.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: I do not understand it! Was it not clear that we wished to remain awhile?

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: I don't know who you people think you are, but do you have any idea what would happen to us if you were found in our village!?

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Again you address us with unwarranted spite! I have let your impropriety pass until now, but no longer!

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Who are you, boy, to speak to me thus? Know you not who I am?

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: (-Isse-)I am Isse of Namai─a farmer, like my father before me, and his father before him. I wouldn't expect a man like you to know who I am─but I know you. We all do!

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: (-Isse-)Lord Kaien's retainer and leader of the rebellion─Gosetsu! Notorious fugitive, wanted dead or alive by the Empire!

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Hah hah hah hah hah! Is that what this is all about?

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: I am hardly the first man to earn the ire of the Empire. Nor will I be the last.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Was not Namai home to brave and true warriors, who fought beneath our banners for king and country?

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: (-Isse-)They fought, and they died. Every last one. And then the imperials came looking for more. Because of them.

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: (-Isse-)They were this close to killing us all─to burning our village to the ground. We've only just begun to enjoy some semblance of peace...

dialogue.name: ISSE
dialogue.text: (-Isse-)Never again─never again, do you understand!? We've had enough of you and yours! Whatever it is you're plotting, leave us out of it!

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: ...Hmm. Impassioned as his pleas may be, surely he must know that I cannot leave things as they are.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: But for now, I shall respect his wishes. We must continue on towards our final destination─the House of the Fierce. Proud headquarters of the Doman Liberation Front.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: There is a secret entrance to the north of Namai, by way of a small spring. Come─I will show you!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: This must be the spring!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And there I was thinking our swimming days were behind us.

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: This way, this way! We must dive into the water!

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Have no fear, Forename! It is but a short distance. You need not hold your breath for long!

dialogue.name: RESSIANGATEKEEPER
dialogue.text: Kami be praised! I know you!

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: <pant> <pant> Hah hah hah! How invigorating!

dialogue.name: GOSETSU
dialogue.text: Congratulations, my friends! You are come to the House of the Fierce!
